title: Quarkus create new project fails when -DnoCode is used and artifactId is not set properly

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

I tried to follow the document to create new project for reactive rest client. However the below Maven command in document failed,
```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create \
    -DprojectGroupId=org.acme \
    -DprojectArtifactId=rest-client-reactive-quickstart \
    -Dextensions='resteasy-reactive-jackson,rest-client-reactive-jackson' \
    -DnoCode
```
When I remove -DnoCode or if I change this to -Dno-code the command works.

Error below
```
D:\quarkus>mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create -DprojectGroupId="org.acme" -Dproject.artifactId=rest-client-reactive-quickstart-1 -Dextensions="resteasy-reactive-jackson,rest-client-jackson" "-DnoCode"
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO]
[INFO] ------------------< org.apache.maven:standalone-pom >-------------------
[INFO] Building Maven Stub Project (No POM) 1
[INFO] --------------------------------[ pom ]---------------------------------
[INFO]
[INFO] --- quarkus:3.7.3:create (default-cli) @ standalone-pom ---
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  2.085 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2024-02-18T00:30:40+03:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create (default-cli) on project standalone-pom: Execution default-cli of goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create failed: Cannot invoke "java.lang.CharSequence.length()" because "this.text" is null -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/PluginExecutionException

```
System Details 

```
OS Name:                   Microsoft Windows 11 Pro
OS Version:                10.0.22631 N/A Build 22631
Executed the command on CMD
```

### Expected behavior

On execution of maven command in document on page https://quarkus.io/guides/rest-client-reactive, the project should have got created.  

```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create \
    -DprojectGroupId=org.acme \
    -DprojectArtifactId=rest-client-reactive-quickstart \
    -Dextensions='resteasy-reactive-jackson,rest-client-reactive-jackson' \
    -DnoCode
```

### Actual behavior

It failed with error
```

D:\quarkus>mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create -DprojectGroupId="org.acme" -Dproject.artifactId=rest-client-reactive-quickstart-1 -Dextensions="resteasy-reactive-jackson,rest-client-jackson" "-DnoCode"
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO]
[INFO] ------------------< org.apache.maven:standalone-pom >-------------------
[INFO] Building Maven Stub Project (No POM) 1
[INFO] --------------------------------[ pom ]---------------------------------
[INFO]
[INFO] --- quarkus:3.7.3:create (default-cli) @ standalone-pom ---
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  2.085 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2024-02-18T00:30:40+03:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create (default-cli) on project standalone-pom: Execution default-cli of goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create failed: Cannot invoke "java.lang.CharSequence.length()" because "this.text" is null -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/PluginExecutionException

```

### How to Reproduce?

1. Execute the below command in windows command line CMD
2. ```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.3:create \
    -DprojectGroupId=org.acme \
    -DprojectArtifactId=rest-client-reactive-quickstart \
    -Dextensions='resteasy-reactive-jackson,rest-client-reactive-jackson' \
    -DnoCode
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

OS Name:                   Microsoft Windows 11 Pro OS Version:                10.0.22631 N/A Build 22631

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "21.0.2" 2024-01-16 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment (Red_Hat-21.0.2.0+13-2) (build 21.0.2+13-LTS) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (Red_Hat-21.0.2.0+13-2) (build 21.0.2+13-LTS, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

D:\quarkus>mvn --version Apache Maven 3.9.0 (9b58d2bad23a66be161c4664ef21ce219c2c8584) Maven home: D:\Softwares\maven\apache-maven-3.9.0 Java version: 21.0.2, vendor: Red Hat, Inc., runtime: D:\Softwares\Java\java-21-openjdk-21.0.2.0.13-2.win.jdk.x86_64 Default locale: en_IN, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "windows 11", version: "10.0", arch: "amd64", family: "windows"

### Additional information

_No response_
